QuestData.Title: Just Around the Corner
QuestData.Description: Blast it! Where are my tools? I had them here just a moment ago.$B$BOh! I probably forgot them when I was setting up that minefield in the west. That's mildly inconvenient. I'd be quite appreciative if you could go get them for me. You'll need to watch your step though... you should be able to use the same path that I did to get out.$B$BOh, and don't try to fly in... I had the presence of mind to set up turrets to shoot down anything that might fly, and they aren't very discerning in who they target.
QuestData.LogDescription: Jeer Sparksocket at K3 would like Sparksocket's Tools retrieved from his minefield.
QuestData.CompletionText: If Janks were here, I could have just sent him on this errand. Oh... on second thought... I'm not sure I told him where the safe path is anyway.$B$BGood thing I have you resourceful adventure types around, eh?
QuestData.RewardText: Ha ha! These are them! Thank you kindly. I hope you didn't have too much trouble traversing the field.
